column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh –------   A truck drove into a train at around 1 am on October 21
column5: along Hanoi Road in Sangkat Teuk Thla
column7: Phnom Penh. ------The truck was transporting oil along Hanoi Road from the south when it drove straight into the path of the oncoming train.------The driver and his passenger were seriously injured and were taken to hospital.------Local authorities towed the vehicle to the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Office to wait for legal action later. ------AREY NEWS
